entry.title: DualSubs/YouTube
entry.summary:
YouTube字幕增强及双语模块

🍿️ DualSubs: ▶ YouTube

  • Dual Subtitles for YouTube
  • YouTube字幕增强及双语模块
  • Powered by Chavy‘s Env.js and 🧰 BoxJs
  • 需要启用重写、脚本、MitM功能
  • 有问题请至Issue页面反馈
  • Telegram讨论组:🍟 整点薯条

快速导航

  • 支持 🎈Loon(推荐), Surge(推荐), Stash, Shadowrocket, Quantumult X
  • macOS 12.6.5, iOS 16.4.1, tvOS 16.4 测试通过
  • 需要启用重写、脚本、MitM功能
  • 本项目可视化配置面板订阅及使用方法详见🧰 BoxJs
  • 点击下方链接直达详细说明
  • 手机等竖屏设备可以👈左右👉划动下列表格查看更多模块
🍿️ DualSubs:
🎦 Streaming		 🍿️ DualSubs:
🇳 Netflix		 🍿️ DualSubs:
▶️ YouTube
简介 简介 简介
功能列表 功能列表 功能列表
使用说明 使用说明 使用说明
安装链接 安装链接 安装链接
🆕新版
v0.7.x		 未发布 🆕新版
v0.5.x
更新日志 更新日志 更新日志
说明/讨论 说明/讨论 说明/讨论

How To

  • 快速创建拥有代理服务器设置及MitM证书的描述文件
  • 在Apple TV (tvOS) 上添加描述文件或MitM证书
  • 在BoxJs中清除DualSubs的设置或缓存

鸣谢

  • 排名不分先后
    • @chavyleung
    • @NobyDa
    • @zZPiglet
    • @yichahucha
    • @Peng-YM
    • @app2smile
    • @MuTu
    • @fengchang
    • @Loon0x00
    • @Tartarus2014
    • @Hackl0us
    • @Koolson

entry.title: Hyraze/ai-collective-tools
entry.summary:
Explore a curated selection of AI tools and resources

aicollective.tools

Explore a curated selection of AI tools and resources.

We're thrilled to invite you to this our open-source community dedicated in creating a comprehensive collection of tools that developers, researchers, and enthusiasts can access, and collaborate on.You can help by sending Pull Requests to add more services and make sure to review our Contribution Guidelines for detailed information on how to get started.


Pricing

Use these hashtags in search to filter out the tools

  • #free
  • #freemium
  • #paid
  • #opensource

Table of Contents

  • 3D
  • Art
  • Audio Editing
  • Avatars
  • Chatbots

3D

  • Alpha3D - Alpha3D is a revolutionary generative AI-powered platform that transforms 2D images into high-quality 3D assets at scale. #paid
  • Any Image to 3D - Simplifies the process of converting 2D images into fully detailed 3D models, catering to industries like gaming, robotics, mixed reality, VFX, and e-commerce. #free
  • OctoEverywhere - OctoEverywhere is a 3D printing failure detection assistant that uses computer vision algorithms to detect printing errors such as spaghetti, layer shifts, adhesion issues, and more #paid
  • Spyne - Spyne is helping used-car dealerships and marketplaces create engaging VDPs with 360° views and images that sell better. #paid
  • GET3D-Nvidia - Generative 3D Textured Shapes from Images. #free
  • Meshy - Create Stunning 3D Game Assets with AI #free
  • Pixela AI - AI-generated game textures. Share yours with the community! #free
  • StudioGPT by Latent Labs - Reimagine Your Visual Designs with AI-Powered Creativity. #paid
  • Pool Planner AI - Visualize Your Dream Pool Design #paid
  • Omnia - Create 3D models based on text prompts or uploaded images. #paid
  • Heroify - Generate high-quality 3D graphics for landing pages. #paid
  • Tafi Avatar - Text-to-3D Character Engine. #paid
  • Unity - Craft interactive, dynamic 3D content for AR, VR, mobile, desktop, and web platforms. #paid

⬆️ Back to Top

Art

  • Dall-E 3 - AI image generator accesible Microsoft's Bing Chat and Bing Image Creator #free
  • PixAI.Art - AI art generator designed specifically for creating anime-inspired artwork #free
  • lexical.Art -AI image generation tool that allows you to create images from text descriptions. #free
  • seaart.ai - AI image generation tool with advanced configurations available, tons of ready to use models and image enhancements, text to img , img to text and much. #freemium

⬆️ Back to Top
